name: .BKK
summary: Learn about .BKK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a BKK file with BookBuddi (Windows). To do so, click the Folder icon in the program's upper-left corner. Then, navigate to and open your BKK file. To play the eBook your BKK file contains as an audiobook, click BookBuddi's Play button.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .bkk file in BookBuddi
images.caption: BKK file open in BookBuddi
